author: Brian in Mesa
title: Momentum
text: Screenwriters: Adam Marcus, Debra Sullivan Genre: Thriller, Action Starring: Olga Kurylenko , James Purefoy Plot Summary: When Alex (Kurylenko), an infiltration expert with a secret past, accidentally reveals her identity during what should have been a routine heist, she quickly finds herself mixed up in a government conspiracy and entangled in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse with a master assassin (Purefoy) and his team of killers. Armed with her own set of lethal skills, Alex looks to exact revenge for her murdered friends while uncovering the truth.
